asteroids.model

Class Ship

  • java.lang.Object
    • asteroids.model.Ship

  • public class Ship
extends java.lang.Object
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Simon Merckx and Tobias Cornille first bach informatics.
    Invariants:
  • The orientation of each ship must be a valid orientation for any ship.
         isValidOrientation(getOrientation())
  • The position of each ship must be a valid position for any ship.
         isValidPosition(getPosition())
  • The velocity of each ship must be a valid velocity for any ship.
         isValidVelocity(getVelocity())
  • Each ship can have its radius as radius.
         canHaveAsRadius(this.getRadius())

      Initialize this new ship with given X coordinate of the position, given Y coordinate of the position, given X component of the velocity, given Y component of the velocity and given orientation.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Ship

        public Ship()
        Initialize this new ship with default values.
        Effect:
        The radius of this new ship is set to 11.
             this.radius = 11

      • Ship

        public Ship(double x,
            double y,
            double xVelocity,
            double yVelocity,
            double radius,
            double orientation)
     throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Initialize this new ship with given X coordinate of the position, given Y coordinate of the position, given X component of the velocity, given Y component of the velocity and given orientation.
        Parameters:
        x - The X coordinate of the position of this new ship.
        y - The Y coordinate of the position of this new ship.
        xVelocity - the X component of the velocity of this new ship.
        yVelocity - the Y component of the velocity of this new ship.
        radius - The radius of this new ship.
        orientation - The orientation of this new ship.
        Precondition:
        The given orientation must be a valid orientation for any ship.
             isValidOrientation(orientation)
        Effects:
      • The position of this new ship is set to the given x, y coordinates.
             this.setPosition(x, y)
      • The velocity of this new ship is set to the given xVelocity, yVelocity values.
            this.setVelocity(xVelocity, yVelocity)
      • The orientation of this new ship is set to the given orientation.
            this.setOrientation(orientation)
      • The radius of this new ship is set to the given radius.
             this.radius = radius
        • Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If radius is invalid | ! canHaveAsRadius(radius)

    • Method Detail

      • getPosition

        @Basic
 @Raw
public double[] getPosition()
        Return the position of this ship.
        Returns:
        Returns the position of this ship.
             result == this.position

      • move

        public void move(double dt)
          throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Change the position of the ship based on the current position, velocity and time duration dt.
        Parameters:
        dt - The given time duration.
        Postcondition:
        The new position of the ship is the old position of the ship plus the displacement of the ship.
             new.getPosition()[0] == this.getPosition()[0] + (this.getVelocity()[0] * dt)
             new.getPosition()[1] == this.getPosition()[1] + (this.getVelocity()[1] * dt)
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

      • getDistanceBetween

        public double getDistanceBetween(Ship ship)
                          throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Returns the distance between two ships. The distance may be negative if both ships overlap. The distance between a ship and itself is zero.
        Parameters:
        ship - The other ship.
        Returns:
        If both ships are the same, 0 is returned. Otherwise, the distance between the two ships with coordinates (x1, y1) and (x2, y2) respectively and their radii is returned.
             if (this == ship)
             then result == 0
             else result == (Math.sqrt(((x2 - x1) * (x2 - x1)) + ((y2 - y1) * (y2 - y1))) - r1 - r2)
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If this method is invoked with null as argument.

      • overlap

        public boolean overlap(Ship ship)
                throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Returns true if and only if 2 ships overlap. A ship always overlaps with itself.
        Parameters:
        ship - The other ship.
        Returns:
        Returns true if and only if 2 ships overlap.
             result == (this.getDistanceBetween(ship) <= 0)
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If this method is invoked with null as argument.

      • getVelocity

        @Basic
 @Raw
public double[] getVelocity()
        Return the velocity of this ship.
        Returns:
        Returns the velocity of this ship.
             result == this.velocity

      • thrust

        public void thrust(double amount)
        Change the velocity of the ship based on the current velocity, the current orientation, and on a given amount.
        Parameters:
        amount - The given amount.
        Postcondition:
        The new velocity of the ship is derived by adding the amount times the cosinus or sinus of the current orientation to the old xVelocity and yVelocity, respectively.
             new.getVelocity()[0] == this.getVelocity()[0] + (amount * Math.cos(this.getOrientation()))
             new.getVelocity()[1] == this.getVelocity()[1] + (amount * Math.sin(this.getOrientation()))
             if (! isValidVelocity(newXVelocity, newYVelocity))
             then newXVelocity = C * Math.cos(this.getOrientation())
                  newYVelocity = C * Math.sin(this.getOrientation())

      • getRadius

        @Basic
 @Raw
 @Immutable
public double getRadius()
        Return the radius of this ship.
        Returns:
        Returns the radius of this ship.
             result == this.radius

        @Basic
 @Raw
public double getOrientation()
        Return the orientation of this ship.
        Returns:
        Returns the orientation of this ship.
             result == this.orientation

      • turn

        public void turn(double angle)
        Turn the ship by adding a given angle to the current orientation.
        Parameters:
        angle - The given angle.
        Precondition:
        The given angle plus the current orientation has to be valid.
            isValidOrientation(this.getOrientation() + angle)
        Postcondition:
        The new orientation of the ship is the old orientation plus the angle.
            new.getOrientation() == this.getOrientation() + angle;

      • getTimeToCollision

        public double getTimeToCollision(Ship ship)
                          throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Returns when, if ever, two ships will collide. Returns Double.POSITIVE_INFINITY if the ships never collide. This method does not apply to ships that overlap.
        Parameters:
        ship - The other ship.
        Returns:
        Returns Double.POSITIVE_INFINITY if the ships never collide. Else, returns the time to the moment when the ships collide.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If this method is invoked with null pointer as argument or if this method is invoked with two overlapping ships. | (ship == null) || (this.overlap(ship))

      • getCollisionPosition

        public double[] getCollisionPosition(Ship ship)
                              throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Returns where, if ever, two ships will collide. Returns null if the ships never collide.
        Parameters:
        ship - The other ship
        Returns:
        Returns null if the ships never collide, else returns the collision position.
             if (this.getTimeToCollision(ship) == Double.POSITIVE_INFINITY)
             then return null
             else
             return collision position
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If this method is invoked with null pointer as argument. | (ship == null)
